page.title: 12My Sunday in Woodlesford.
page.content: I jump out of bed ready and fit to dance because it is a competition day in Bradford,so everybody runs down stairs to try to get first to breakfast. I have cereals and toast, but I don't eat much because I have butterflies. When we are ready my dad starts the car and we set off. We arrive at the dancehall for 9.45 and the first round is at 10.30. When everybody gets changed they are all waiting for the first round to start. The first round is the gold bars section. Then all the people walk onto the floor waiting for the record to start. After we've finished they give you your positions. I came third,I get a bronze medal and I am excited, it's my first competition. .
